snippet: This week Harvard and M.I.T. announced a $60 million online-classroom venture named edX. The non-profit enterprise will offer a variety of free courses across disciplines for anyone with an Internet connection.
abstract: This week Harvard and M.I.T. announced a $60 million online-classroom venture named edX. The non-profit enterprise will offer a variety of free courses across disciplines for anyone with an Internet connection.

headline.main: Harvard and M.I.T. Take Their Classes Online
